Package com.perfectoMobile.page.keyWord.step.spi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KWSAttribute
    Keyword(s): ATTRIBUTE
    The Attribute keyword allows the developer to extract a named attributes value from an Element and either store it or compare it to provided value.
    KWSBreak
    Keyword(s): BREAK
    The break keyword is used in conjunction with a the loop keyword.
    KWSCall
    Keyword(s): CALL
    The Call keyword allows the developer to execute a function or test defined in XML.
    KWSCheckColor
    Keyword(s): VERIFY_COLOR
    The verify color keyword allow you to select a point from a named element, extract the color and compare it to a know color.
    KWSClick
    Keyword(s): CLICK
    The click keyword allows you to locate an element on the screen and click on it


    Example(s): This example will click on an element named 'TEST_ELEMENT' from TEST_PAGE
    <step name="TEST_ELEMENT" type="CLICK" page="TEST_PAGE" />
    KWSContrastRatio
    The Class KWSValue.
    KWSDevice
    The Class KWSGesture.
    KWSExists
    Keyword(s): EXISTS
    The exists keyword verifies that an element is present.
    KWSFork
    The Class KWSFork.
    KWSFunction

    The Class KWSGesture.
